Package abalone

Class SmartyAI

  • java.lang.Object
    • abalone.AI
      • abalone.SmartyAI
  • public class SmartyAI
extends AI
    The AI is focused on going to the center. Created on 17-01-2019.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sam Freriks and Ayla van der Wal.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SmartyAI

        public SmartyAI​(Board board,
                Marble color,
                AbaloneClient client,
                MoveCheck checker,
                java.lang.String name)
        the constructor of the ai. Creates a new AI with the given board, color, client, checker and name.
        Parameters:
        board - the board the ai player will play on
        color - the color the ai represents
        client - the client the ai is.
        checker - the checker for the move checks.
        name - the name of the ai
        Ensures
        this.board == board, this.color == color, this.client == client, this.checker == checker, this.name == name

      • getHint

        public java.lang.String getHint​(Board board,
                                Marble color,
                                MoveCheck checker)
        returns a valid move to do , a hint.
        Parameters:
        board - the board for the hint
        color - the color to use
        checker - the checker
        Returns:
        a string that contains a marble of the color and a valid direction
        Requires
        board != null, color != null, checker != null

      • getHintForAiMarbles

        public int getHintForAiMarbles()
        sends a marble that will have a valid move.
        Returns:
        a marble which can make a valid move.
        Ensures
        that a valid move is collected

      • makeMove

        public void makeMove​(boolean send)
              throws ServerUnavailableException
        constructs a move and send a command to the client to send it.
        Overrides:
        makeMove in class AI
        Parameters:
        send - if the constructed move should be send.
        Throws:
        ServerUnavailableException - throws this exception is the server could not be reached.
        Requires
        send == true || send == false
        Ensures
        is send to client as a move to be made if send == true
